Header: Shramadana at Wedahitikanda, Kataragama Given Army Support
Content: 122 Brigade troops-based in Kataragama conducted a Shramadana campaign in the sacred Wedasitikanda at Kataragama on Wednesday (15) on the direction given by Major General S.A Thilakararathne, General Officer Commanding 12 Division HQ at Hambantota. 23 Gajaba Regiment and 3 Sri Lanka National troops contributed to the project and completed the project to the satisfaction of all resident monks.
